response.original_title: Littlest Pet Shop: Pet Shop Pals
response.overview: Blythe and her very best friends (Zoe the spaniel, Pepper the skunk, Sunil the mongoose, Russell the hedgehog, Penny the panda, Minka the monkey and Buttercream the bunny) are back for five more exciting, not to mention hilarious, adventures! Plus, youll get a chance to meet some new friends, like a shy tortoise, a spying cat, a famous comedian orangutan, and Peppers new crush! Who could it be? Find out with Blythe and the gang in The Littlest Pet Shop: Pet Shop Pals!
response.title: Littlest Pet Shop: Pet Shop Pals
